title: Hire an App Developer
desc: Event Ticketing/Guestlist AppHi,I am looking to create a event ticketing/guestlist app.Event Managers should be able to create an event similar to a Facebook Event Page (to add details and pictures or short video) with an Integration to collect Data to add to a Guest List for attendees and sell tickets directly through this platform.The Event should geo-locate onto a google map to give easy directions.The app should have access to the phone's Contact listBarcode or QR Code should be generated once someone adds themselves to the guest-list OR Buys a ticket.Barcode or QR Code scanner needs to be inbuilt into the app (to view peoples tickets and scan directly from phone to phone)Backend should be able to give off basic analytics like No. of Views Reports, Ticket Sales, Guest list reports, No. of people invited or joined or going reports, age, gender, location reports etcOn the Customers Side:They should be able to view the Event similar to how its on FacebookThey should be able to easily share the events with their friends directly through the app/contact list or WhatsAppEasily find directions to the event ORTo leave a message to the Event Manager's directly (if needed)___________________________________________________________________________The UI should be simple, clean and easy to use like WhatsApp. Basic and a No-brainer.The app should be able to run on its own without too much external supervision, i.e. once the platform is made should be easy to overlook and maintain even by a layman.___________________________________________________________________________Looking forward to connecting with someone who understands what Less is More means. For someone who is not only creative, but someone who believes in creating platforms to help connect Events to People and vice-versa._____________________________________________________________________________Please do not send me someone else's code or plagiarize anyone else's work.We would require the entire app code and design once the project is completed.

title: Eclipse/Google Play Console Expert
desc: One of our games on the PlayStore was accidentally enrolled into Google Play App Signing. No idea how it happened, but we probably just accidentally uploaded our KEY and even we didn't encrypt it, Google accepted it.Now we have an App Signing Certificate and an Upload Certificate which we don't know how to use. It seems that this messes as well with the Google Play Service and the Leaderboard with the consequence that the player can't log in. It seems we are managin two version of the same app. Two different SHA-1 Certificates. So once we upoad the game with the original KEY, it then gets automatically changed by Google Play. The strangest thing is that we still can sign the app with the old KEY generated within Eclipse when we first exported the game. Something that according to Google guidelines should not be possible.We hope/guess that there is a simple solution to the problem, but we need to make it work with Eclipse which is the only app we can run our app in, since we used Buildbox to create the game.If you are an expert in Eclipse and Google Play Service please help us resolve this issue as soon as possible and show us how we can keep working with the new Certificates for future updates.Thanks.

desc: Dear all  ,hope you are doing fine , please read carefully before your bid ,what i need exactly , is the following , simply is to control esp32 module with ios app or android app through web server . control mean switch led ON/OFF, the ESP have push button , which will enable bluetooth when i want setup the wifi setting and server ..i already do it with other freelancer , but it is not reach to my requirement , but it work normally with me , i can share it to speed up the process ... what i have now is following ,1- source code for android apk ..2- FW for esp32 to enable bluetooth and connect to android app and then to server ..3- php server source code ,,now i program the esp32 via esp32_win32_msys2_environment_and_toolchain,is a little a large time process to program , and as i need to make HOQ ( High of quantity) i need other way to program the esp32 and more fast ..please  any one bid in this project """""should"""" have it and aware how to use it .. please what i need is following : -1- FW for ESP32 with max stability2- server3- app for android and IOS ( it must for both not only one )again i have the FW V1.0 for esp32 which work perfectly with me but need some modification and server already online and """""" i do not have IOS app """" , need to be develop ..also i can start voice chat to confirm every thing before start ...good luck for you all ..regards

title: STB Middleware Android stalker Box
desc: Hello all talented devs,I am in the Android IPTV/OTT set-top box market. I want to create a set-top box emulator or app for this popular middleware known as – Stalker Middleware – which is free and open source software that is available and made by Infomir for operators to use. There is an API available for this middleware, I will attach the documentation for the middleware and V1 of the rest API.I would need someone to build this project as I can explain more details if you are interested.I am looking for a developer who is familiar with (or willing to learn) stalker middleware and their mag stb’s (set-top boxes from infomir based off Linux) to create an emulator/app for android 7.1 with UI re-design that I will provide. This has already been done by 3 other people and I would like to replicate it. Below I will attach as much information as I can for you to understand and see. I believe unless you install the middleware it's self on a dev server and learn it and see how it functions you will be able to successfully finish this job. If you can see the end points of the API perhaps you will be able to create an app that directly has these functions: Live TV, VoD, EPG, Favorites, and Parental Lock - where it pulls the contents from the operators server to successfully deliver the contents to the client side through the Android stb.here is a video of an existing project[url removed, login to view]Firmware Android Box wit API Linux[url removed, login to view]If you are interest please PM me directly for fastest response. If you have any additional questions or requirements please leave a message here I will respond. I am looking for on-going long term co-operation with job payment.

title: Import exist Phonegap/Cordova Project to Android Studio adjusted to Api level 26 fix bugs and add bluetooth function
desc: We have an app that is already in playstore. The app warns driver against road hazards.If app starts, gives an audible alert about gps status (on / off). Then there is again only audible messages when alarm occur (voice message & beep).The app is divided into two versions (a free version with function restrictions and a premium version with full access to all functions). We give you two folders with the source code of the app (one folder contains the free version and the second folder the premium version).Task:1.	Import exist Phonegap/Cordova Project to Android Studio adjusted to Api level 26. Fix current bugs, errors and warnings .1.1.	The last adjustments correspond to Api level 23 compatibility. The source code must be adapted and adjusted to Api level 26 accordingly. Please fix all errors and warnings.1.2.	Current Bugs to fix:•	partial problems with GPS -> Widget and background operation do not works stable on all devices•	Contact form does not workAfter adjust Api level and fix bugs and warnings, we can then test and if already is okmake a partial payment.2.	Add new Bluetooth function. If app starts, gives an audible alert about gps status (on / off). Then there is again only audible messages when alarm occur (voice message & beep). The problem is, that transmitted alert immediately through the A2DP interface to audio stream function of the car navigation system.2.1.	in the audio menu of the app is Bluetooth deactivated (standard), the sound from the app is only output via the internal speaker of device.Important Note!! Deactivating Bluetooth output only applies to the app, not to the system. All other applications on smartphone can use Bluetooth (example: free speech in car).2.2.	in the audio menu of the app Bluetooth can should be activated, then the sound is output simultaneously at the internal speaker of device and via Bluetooth.Requirements and payment information:It is expected that you have good experience and skills with Android programming.You make the changes and test the app in a real environment (not only in the emulator). This is especially important for the Bluetooth function.After completion, you will send us the source code and we will import it into Android Studio and compile an APK. We will test this APK on three devices (one device with Android version 6, 7 and 8).When everything works, we will release the payment. There is no payment release prior to completion and successful test.

title: Android IPTV/OTT
desc: Hello all talented devs,I am in the Android IPTV/OTT set-top box market. I want to create a set-top box emulator or app for this popular middleware known as – Stalker Middleware – which is free and open source software that is available and made by Infomir for operators to use. There is an API available for this middleware, I will attach the documentation for the middleware and V1 of the rest API.I would need someone to build this project as I can explain more details if you are interested.I am looking for a developer who is familiar with (or willing to learn) stalker middleware and their mag stb’s (set-top boxes from infomir based off Linux) to create an emulator/app for android 7.1 with UI re-design that I will provide. This has already been done by 3 other people and I would like to replicate it. Below I will attach as much information as I can for you to understand and see. I believe unless you install the middleware it's self on a dev server and learn it and see how it functions you will be able to successfully finish this job. If you can see the end points of the API perhaps you will be able to create an app that directly has these functions: Live TV, VoD, EPG, Favorites, and Parental Lock - where it pulls the contents from the operators server to successfully deliver the contents to the client side through the Android stb.here is a video of an existing project[url removed, login to view]Firmware Android Box wit API Linux[url removed, login to view]If you are interest please PM me directly for fastest response. If you have any additional questions or requirements please leave a message here I will respond. I am looking for on-going long term co-operation with job payment.

title: IPTV Application for android Devices (Box, Phone, Tablet)
desc: Here is what to do,Application:1.	Login Screen (PIN Code Activation) But devices should be registered first using MAC ID in the admin Panel.2.	All Channels list (Logo, Name, number and category)3.	Categorie List (Category logo and Name4.	Catch-UP TV (Replay) List (Channel Name, Logo, Date and time based EPG5.	Channel Sub-menu  (Country, Genre, Categories)6.	Live Channel Preview (Auto Play Preview on Channel selection)7.	Press OK to Play in full screen8.	Change channel with UP/DOWN Keys, Change channel with Numbers.9.	Press OK again to show channels Sub-Menu while in Full screen10.	Long Press OK to add channel to favorites.11.	Long Press OK to remove channel from Favorites12.	User Profile (Subscription information, expiry etc)13.	Device information (STB Model, MAC ID, Serial No etc)14.	On application load, last played channel should be played.15.	On application load, should check for updates16.	On application load, should check for activation status, if activation is expired should show a message to user.17.	On stream load, should look for ads from server (Pre-Roll  10-30 second ads with Escape Option)18.	On stream load, should show ads in hourly interval, should not play every time. If a user receives ad now, he should not receive ads again until one hour. After one hour when he changes the channel then he should receive a new ad again.19.	Interface changes, would look and feel like TV app not mobile app.20.	Sub Channel list or Transparent Channels list should appear on by pressing OK Button on remote, while other channel is in full screen mode. Like all other traditional TVs.21.	User Registrations should be confirmed by Admins before user can access the user interface. Non-Registered users given access to demo channels only. A database table should be created for all devices which  contain the following info  (DeviceID, DeviceType, DeviceName, MacID, Serial Number). The BoxID should be relational to CustomerID and admin can see which customer has which box.22.	User should be able to add or remove a channel from favorites by long pressing OK Key on remote. Favorited channel’s logo should have a small golden start on the top right corner.23.	Share bottons should be removed.24.	After application load, all category list should appear, then the user should be able to choose which category he would like to open and watch.25.	Full screen ads should appear after application load, user should be able to close the ad without waiting (static full screen bannersMaybe we will add more option if necessary

title: Taximeter Tester
desc: We are looking for an APP to be written for an android, the APP is to be used to test taximeters.  So we start the app, displayed are two button's called ‘Start’ and ‘View’, we press the Start button and the display now shows a six digit counter for counting a yard, and two buttons one button called ‘Stopped’ and one called ‘Log’. We now start the taximeter to be tested and drive the vehicle, as we see the fare on the taximeter increment (add ten pence) we press the log button, this records the yards travelled from the start to this point, when we see the taximeter increment again, we press the log button again and the app records the yards travelled from the start of the second log, we can do this up to ten times.  At any point the operator can press the Stop button, when they do the display it will show the logs that were made, up to ten of them. Two other buttons are displayed at this point, ‘Close’ and ‘Save’, if Save is pressed, the app ask for a name for the files to be saved as, like car reg or taxi plate number. So when we start the APP from the beginning and press the ‘View’ button, the APP displays the saved tests, we can select one and it will display the Logs made.
